   {"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"https://www.imdb.com/title/tt2948356/","name":"Zootopia","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOTMyMjEyNzIzMV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwNzIyNjU0NzE@._V1_.jpg","description":"In a city of anthropomorphic animals, a rookie bunny cop and a cynical con artist fox must work together to uncover a conspiracy.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"Movie","url":"https://www.imdb.com/title/tt2948356/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"kukuhrahayu"},"dateCreated":"2019-05-13","inLanguage":"English","name":"Zootopia : The Inspiring Movie","reviewBody":"Zootopia is a 3D animation movie produced by Walt Disney. Zootopia is a big city over there. Like its name, this city contains all animal characters such a zoo as well. We can find so many animal characters here and of course they bring their own characteristics. They are rabbits, foxes, goats, sheeps, wolfs, lion, sheep, rhinoceros, and any others. And the main character is a bunny or we know it as a rabbit called Judy Hopps. Ya, just a little rabbit who has wanted to be a policewoman since she was child while there was no rabbit be police. There is no matter if the citizen are just rabbits, but the problem is the citizen are not only rabbits but all of animals are over there. There are many big and strong animals such rhinoceros or lions who are more appropriate to be police than just a bunny. She had been underestimated by every one for dreaming to be police, even by her parents. But it was not a problem for her, even she must pass many difficulties, she just kept trying and trying and finally she got appreciation to be the best police since she could finish a mission of a case and found something new on it.\n\n1. Animation The animation moving is very smooth such as another 3D animation movie. The characters are drawn well, suit to their characteristic. We can know directly how is a character&apos;s feature even just see them, not watch them. It run a same way when some characters turn characteristic, from good to bad or vice versa, we can know it directly by their expression. It eases children to know how feature of the characters are, so they won&apos;t be confused by watching this movie especially when some characters change their appanage. This movie has a beautiful color, contras but still in harmony and it makes gazer, from children to adult, be able to enjoy this movie well. 2. Score For me, every single sound in this movie is nice, very nice. From the dubbing, sound effect, and of course the sound track. The sound track, Try Everything by Shakira, is very representative that movie and it suits when it played while Judy Hopps was enjoying her journey from her hometown to Zootopia. So, we, as gazer, can enjoy both of picture and the song. 3. Plot twist This is the most unexpected part of this movie when Mrs. Bellwether changed into a bad character. In the beginning, she was very good and helpful to Judy, but it turned out that she was a mastermind of all of &quot;disaster&quot; in the movie. This part gives us some breaks when we have a bit been bored think who is the mastermind of the problem. 4. Moral Value Same as its soundtrack, this movie reminds us not to give up on everything, just keep trying and trying, trying everything and making something new. Life is all about problems, problems always come and leave. One problem has been solved and another problem will come to us, of course, that&apos;s a life. And for facing our problem, just ignore people say for braking our dream, just keep trying and prove that we can do for reaching our dream. And don&apos;t be afraid to fall on our journey, believe in ourselves that we can, we can, and we can. This movie was very impressive to me when I watched in 2016, I was in senior high school. I had a dream that it was very difficult for me at that time. It made me doubt that I could reach my dream. By watching this movie, I cried and created an advice for my own, &quot;Believe in yourself that you can reach what you want as long as you want to try more, more and more, nothing impossible in this world.&quot; Moreover, the plot twist reminds us for not to ease believing someone and not to judge a book by its cover.\n\nFor me, this movie has almost no lack. This film is very recommended for watching by everyone, from children to adult, even elderly, because of its own picture and its value. For children who haven&apos;t been able to understand the value, they can enjoy the beautiful picture, the cute characters and moments, and of course the song.   <script id="ads_doWithAds">
   doWithAds = function(inside, failureMessage){
if ('consoleLog' in window &&
'generic' in window &&
'ad_utils' in window &&
'custom' in window &&
'monitoring' in generic &&
'document_is_ready' in generic) {
try{
inside.call(this);
}catch(e) {
if ( window.ueLogError ) {
if(typeof failureMessage !== 'undefined'){
e.message = failureMessage;
}
e.attribution = "Advertising";
e.logLevel = "ERROR";
ueLogError(e);
}
if( (document.location.hash.match('debug=1')) &&
(typeof failureMessage !== 'undefined') ){
console.error(failureMessage);
}
}
} else {
if( (document.location.hash.match('debug=1')) &&
(typeof failureMessage !== 'undefined') ){
console.error(failureMessage);
}
}
};

  <script>
   (function (win) {
    window.PLAID_LOAD_FONTS_FIRED = true;

    if (typeof win.FontFace !== "undefined"
        && typeof win.Promise !== "undefined") {
        if (win.ue) {
            win.uet("bb", "LoadFonts", { wb: 1 });
        }
        var allowableLoadTime = 1500;
        var startTimeInt = +new Date();
        var fonts = [
            
    new FontFace(
        'Roboto',
        'url(https://m.media-amazon.com/images/G/01/IMDb/cm9ib3Rv._TTW_.woff2)',
        {style: "normal", weight: 400}
    ), 
    new FontFace(
        'Roboto',
        'url(https://m.media-amazon.com/images/G/01/IMDb/cm9ib3RvTWVk._TTW_.woff2)',
        {style: "normal", weight: 500}
    ), 
    new FontFace(
        'Roboto',
        'url(https://m.media-amazon.com/images/G/01/IMDb/cm9ib3RvQm9sZA._TTW_.woff2)',
        {style: "normal", weight: 600}
    )
        ];

        var loadPromises = [];
        for (var i = 0; i < fonts.length; i++) {
            loadPromises.push(fonts[i].load());
        }

        win.Promise.all(loadPromises).then(function() {
            var loadTimeInt = +new Date();
            var fontLoadedCount = 0;
            if ((loadTimeInt - startTimeInt) <= allowableLoadTime) {
                for (var j = 0; j < fonts.length; j++) {
                    win.document.fonts.add(fonts[j]);
                    fontLoadedCount++;
                }
            }
            if (win.ue) {
                win.ue.count("font-loaded", fontLoadedCount);
                win.uet("be", "LoadFonts", { wb: 1 });
                win.uex("ld", "LoadFonts", { wb: 1 });
            }
        }).catch(function() {
            if (win.ue) {
                win.ue.count("font-loaded", 0);
            }
        });
    } else {
        if (win.ue) {
            win.ue.count("font-load-not-attempted", 1);
        }
    }
})(window);
  </script>

             <script>
              var ad_utils = ad_utils || window.top.ad_utils;
var csmMetrics = window.top.ue;
function fireBtrPixel(isBtrCompliant) {
if (isBtrCompliant && ad_utils && ad_utils.adsBtrUtils) {
let impressionPixelUrl;
// For a PPB ad, we source the AAX impression pixel URL from the list of PPB trackers
const ppbTrackers = ['https://s.amazon-adsystem.com/iui3?d=forester-did&ex-fargs=%3Fi%3D5jYDTPf46RS1t7tUTqMMTg%26e%3Dimpression%26a%3D5921934150401%26c%3D6996060030801%26s%3Dpda%26u%3DJteJZaSdwu5Sgd5s.Sll8g&ex-fch=416719&cb=1712818902164&210674692&1970295841', 'https://aax-us-east.amazon-adsystem.com/e/is/0D1F62B13847A2208AFDD03AE9103744/imp?b=JCbXiWWkncLuUoHebP0pZfIAAAGOy_ZUdwEAAADKAQBvbm9fdHhuX2JpZDIgICBvbm9fdHhuX2ltcDEgICApN1YC&w=${AUCTION_PRICE:AMZN}&bi=9iRfwnIMlkKmclqyaQjbI6XmpbpDblBOcIca1iX6feQuN99-7DzGNDbWTa.VAAPppbiUmKybM-gyP2tjcprCYr7xJON3261l1-hwatKRHP-dmvbcCXYUtxKWNfpp4IQ2sQYuUgWOi.cCn7ajA48g9oaFM4LrCFGDXpQOfjUpaS3GjhXKLTPyFSB7qfKPpjjJJYKZGSFzePjYsQPHKcmiahnVTS3qR4Y-0KNcUXY2ryQo9EGb1NpHOR5gEbFNkDHU2ll2laE-cyUxauV9i8WzHoBLhM1MLRzt0fr6M6Kk6A2F9isW8JZaPqMA-gJy6Evgq4g3etivFBbjmQeBiKs7DkCaavcpS8hoBrDshgtBvTmUXPixOjtENKFcKrSlvJDw3Ixsz5kVcQrQ617SpBv61hN4ZhdsOQMhn65sNmqii7hiRAe85.PpXIMk-m7w3dmIDgAwYpe7.5QrwcSTasO4Totd0dhKY4UpWiP3tS7kRqDD3hLn0nZLwy7OZHatytnr7TUWWESEXlAvj8VRsJYLPNOnpjWNJ82a2USvi0OYuf7jETFHbjsueFrsiUKo0OBbASRxLIWca297bJvClqaH7HgGgCbUBxvR61jwamsZrZBDyBweqcmuZEfj-snov5fe', ];
ppbTrackers.every(function(tracker) {
if (ad_utils.adsBtrUtils.isAaxImpression(tracker)) {
impressionPixelUrl = tracker;
return false;
}
return true;
});
const btrPixelUrl = ad_utils.adsBtrUtils.modifyPixelUrlToBtrCompliant(impressionPixelUrl);
if (btrPixelUrl) {
ad_utils.adsBtrUtils.createBtrPixel(
btrPixelUrl,
document.body,
'provider_promotion');
}
}
}
function btrEvaluationCallback(creativeParentElement) {
if (ad_utils && ad_utils.adsBtrUtils && ad_utils.tarnhelmAdUtils) {
var creativeDocument = window.tarnhelmDocument || document;
var tarnhelmData = window.tarnhelmData || (window.tarnhelm_backup && window.tarnhelm_backup.appData) || window.unitData;
if (tarnhelmData) {
ad_utils.tarnhelmAdUtils.markTarnhelmAdForMRC(tarnhelmData, creativeDocument);
}
if (ad_utils.CREM) {
ad_utils.CREM.evaluateBTRCriteria(creativeDocument, creativeParentElement, function(result) {
fireBtrPixel(result.isBTRCompliant);
});
}
if (csmMetrics && typeof csmMetrics.count === 'function') {
csmMetrics.count('1PimpressionPixelFiredWithBTR', 0);
csmMetrics.count('provider_promotion_1PimpressionPixelFiredBTR', 0);
}
}
}
let creativeParentElement;
// We don't want to search the whole page for PPB, only what's under the Promoted Partner Bar parent div
if ('promoted_provider' === 'provider_promotion') {
creativeParentElement = document.getElementById('promoted-partner-bar');
// Otherwise, we use the iframe
} else {
creativeParentElement = document.body;
}
btrEvaluationCallback(creativeParentElement);
             </script>
             <script>
              var csmMetrics = window.top.ue;
if (csmMetrics && typeof csmMetrics.count === 'function') {
csmMetrics.count('impressionPixelFired', 0);
csmMetrics.count('provider_promotion_impressionPixelFired', 0);
}
             </script>
             <span aria-label="Get information, provide feedback or report sponsored ad" class="sponsored_label" id="provider_promotion_sponsored" role="button" tabindex="0">
              SPONSORED
             </span>
             <script id="ad_feedback_handler">
              (function(window, document) {
let slotName = 'provider_promotion';
let linkEl = document.querySelector('#' + slotName + '_sponsored');
if (!linkEl) return;
let adFeedbackUrl = 'https://adinfo.amazon.com/?pl=%7B%22version%22%3A%221.0.0%22%2C%22client%22%3A%22IMDB%22%2C%22lop%22%3A%22en_US%22%2C%22marketplace%22%3A%22%22%2C%22region%22%3A%22NA%22%2C%22placementMetaData%22%3A%7B%22pageType%22%3A%22title%22%2C%22slotName%22%3A%22provider_promotion%22%7D%2C%22creativeMetaData%22%3A%7B%22adProgramId%22%3A%221001%22%2C%22adElementId%22%3A%22provider_promotion%22%2C%22creativeDetailsList%22%3A%5B%7B%22campaignId%22%3A%223926404101%22%2C%22adId%22%3A%225921934150401%22%2C%22creativeId%22%3A%226996060030801%22%2C%22campaignIdNS%22%3A%22%22%2C%22selectionSignals%22%3A%7B%7D%2C%22advertiserInfo%22%3A%7B%22advertiserIdNS%22%3A%22%22%7D%7D%5D%7D%7D';
linkEl.addEventListener('click', function () {
if (window.ue && typeof window.ue.count === 'function') {
window.ue.count('SponsoredLink.Display', 1);
}
if (adFeedbackUrl) {
window.open(adFeedbackUrl, '_blank');
}
});
})(window, document);
             </script>
            </div>
            <script type="text/javascript">
             if (typeof window.uet === 'function') {
window.uet('be', 'provider:promotion', {wb: 1});
}
if (typeof window.csa === 'function') {

            <script type="text/javascript">
             var ppb = document.getElementById('promoted-partner-bar');
var ppbAnchor = document.getElementById('promoted-partner-bar-link');
var providerMessages = document.getElementById('ppb-messages');
var providerMessage = document.getElementById('provider-message');
var offerMessageWrapper = document.getElementById('offer-message-wrapper');
var offerMessage = document.getElementById('offer-message');
var logoSlider = document.getElementById('logo-slider');
var ppbStyles = document.getElementById('ppb-styles');
var providerLogos = document.getElementById('provider-logos');
var ppbVerticalPadding = ppb.style.paddingTop * 2;
var ppbHorizontalPadding = ppb.style.paddingRight * 2;
var ppbWidth = ppb.offsetWidth - ppbHorizontalPadding;
var ppbHeight = ppb.offsetHeight - ppbVerticalPadding;
var largeBreakpointWidth = 1023;
var adUtils = window.top.ad_utils;
var isResponsive = adUtils && adUtils.isResponsive ? adUtils.isResponsive() : false;
var isTempStylingPresent = true;
var screenWidth;
var logoSliderHeight;
var offerMessageList;
var providerMessageList;
var providerLogoList;
if (isResponsive) {
ppb.classList.add('responsive-ppb');
} else {
ppb.classList.add('legacy-ppb');
}
providerMessageList = [
{ "contentField": "Enjoy unlimited streaming on Prime Video ", "startDate": "", "endDate": "null" },{ "contentField": "Wonky Offer Message", "startDate": "2100-01-01", "endDate": "null" },
];
offerMessageList = [
{ "contentField": "Start your 30-day free trial today", "startDate": "", "endDate": "null" },{ "contentField": "Wonky Offer Message", "startDate": "2100-01-01", "endDate": "null" },
];
if (providerMessageList) {
var index = adUtils && adUtils.dateCheck ? adUtils.dateCheck(providerMessageList, true) : null;
if (typeof index !== 'undefined' && index !== null) {
providerMessage.innerText += providerMessageList[index].contentField.toString();
if (adUtils && adUtils.adsBtrUtils) {
adUtils.adsBtrUtils.markElementBtr(providerMessage);
}
}
}
if (offerMessageList) {
var index = adUtils && adUtils.dateCheck ? adUtils.dateCheck(offerMessageList, true) : null;
if (typeof index !== 'undefined' && index !== null) {
offerMessage.innerText += offerMessageList[index].contentField.toString();
if (adUtils && adUtils.adsBtrUtils) {
adUtils.adsBtrUtils.markElementBtr(offerMessage);
}
}
}
// check if it's Android/iOS dark theme
var isMobileApp = false;
var isDark = false;
var isIos = false;
if (window.NativeWebBridge) {
window.NativeWebBridge.getPlatform().then(checkAppDarkTheme).catch((error) => console.log(error));
} else {
renderPromotedPartnerBar(ppb, logoSlider, providerLogoList, isMobileApp, isDark);
}
function checkAppDarkTheme(result) {
if (result.os && (result.os === 'android' || result.os === 'ios')) {
isMobileApp = true;
if (result.os === 'ios') {
isIos = true;
}
window.NativeWebBridge.getTheme().then(result => {
isDark = !(result && result === 'light');
renderPromotedPartnerBar(ppb, logoSlider, providerLogoList, isMobileApp, isDark);
if (document.readyState == 'complete') {
logIosDebugMessage('reached: document.readyState == complete');
resizePromotedPartnerBarOnApp();
} else {
logIosDebugMessage('set: window.onload');
window.onload = resizePromotedPartnerBarOnApp;
}
}).catch((error) => console.log(error));
}
}
function logIosDebugMessage(message) {
if (isIos) {
console.log('[PPB debug] ' + message.toString());
}
}
function resizePromotedPartnerBarOnApp() {
logIosDebugMessage('reached resizePromotedPartnerBarOnApp()');
var htmlElement = window.document.documentElement;
var width;
var height;
if (isIos) {
height = ppb.clientHeight;
width = ppb.clientWidth;
logIosDebugMessage('ppb.clientWidth: ' + width.toString());
logIosDebugMessage('ppb.clientHeight: ' + height.toString());
} else {
width = htmlElement.clientWidth;
height = htmlElement.clientHeight;
}
if (height && height !== 0) {
window.NativeWebBridge.setWidgetAspectRatio(width / height)
.then(result => {})
.catch(error => console.log(error));
logIosDebugMessage('width in resizePromotedPartnerBarOnApp(): ' + width.toString());
logIosDebugMessage('height in resizePromotedPartnerBarOnApp(): ' + height.toString());
}
enableSlideshow();
}
function renderPromotedPartnerBar(ppb, logoSlider, providerLogoList, isMobileApp, isDark) {
var logoCount;
if (adUtils && adUtils.registerClickTrackers) {
adUtils.registerClickTrackers(ppbAnchor);
}
if (isDark) {
ppb.classList.add('promoted-provider-dark-theme');
ppb.classList.add(isIos ? 'ppb-ios' : 'ppb-android');
}
if (isMobileApp && !isDark) {
providerLogoList = [
];
} else {
providerLogoList = [
{ "contentField": "https://images-na.ssl-images-amazon.com/images/G/01/shazam/PVLogo-nobackground-0187e7b4-077f-4ab3-8046-2ba3c3ead73b-6e5d31c6-7fa3-470e-927d-caaab7e63742.jpg", "startDate": "", "endDate": "" }
];
}
var results = [];
if (providerLogoList.length > 0) {
results = [0];
logoCount = 1;
if (providerLogoList.length > 1 && adUtils && adUtils.dateCheck) {
results = adUtils.dateCheck(providerLogoList, false);
logoCount = results.length;
}
}
const hasSingleLogo = logoCount === 1;
if (results.length > 0) {
results.forEach(function (result, index) {
var newImage = document.createElement('img');
if (hasSingleLogo || index === 0) {
newImage.setAttribute('style', 'display: none');
if (adUtils && adUtils.adsBtrUtils) {
adUtils.adsBtrUtils.markElementBtr(newImage);
}
}
newImage.setAttribute('alt', 'Sponsor Logo');
newImage.setAttribute('src', providerLogoList[result].contentField);
newImage.classList.add('provider-logo');
newImage.setAttribute('onload', 'resizeImage(' + index + ', '+ isResponsive.toString() +', '
+ hasSingleLogo.valueOf() + ');');
logoSlider.appendChild(newImage);
});
if (logoCount > 1) {
ppbStyles.innerHTML +=
'.slide img {\n' +
' position: absolute;\n' +
' left: 0px;\n' +
' top: 0;\n' +
' animation: slide ' + (logoCount * 2) + 's forwards;\n' +
' display: block;\n' +
'}';
setAnimationCSS(logoCount);
enableSlideshow();
window.addEventListener('scroll', enableSlideshow, supportsPassive ? { passive: true } : false);
if (isIos) {
window.NativeWebBridge.subscribe({
'onScrollChange': () => {
resizePromotedPartnerBarOnApp();
enableSlideshow();
}
});
window.document.body.style.margin = '0';
}
} else {
logoSlider.classList.remove('hide-logo');
if (isIos) {
window.NativeWebBridge.subscribe({'onScrollChange': resizePromotedPartnerBarOnApp});
window.document.body.style.margin = '0';
}
}
}
var supportsPassive = false;
try {
var opts = Object.defineProperty({}, 'passive', {
get: function() {
supportsPassive = true;
}
});
window.addEventListener('passiveSupport', null, opts);
window.removeEventListener('passiveSupport', null, opts);
} catch (e) {}
if (isResponsive) {
window.addEventListener('resize', function () {
for (let i = 0; i < logoCount; i++) {
resizeImage(i, true, hasSingleLogo);
}
}, true);
}
}
function setAnimationCSS(logoCount) {
var animationDelay = 1 + ((logoCount-2) * 0.5);
for (var i = 0; i < logoCount-1; i++) {
if ((i + 2) === logoCount) {
ppbStyles.innerHTML +=
'.slide img:nth-child(' + logoCount + ') {\n' +
'animation: finalSlide ' + 2 * logoCount + 's forwards;\n' +
'animation-delay: ' + animationDelay * (logoCount - 1) + 's;\n' +
'opacity: 0;\n' +
'}\n';
} else {
ppbStyles.innerHTML +=
'.slide img:nth-child(' + (i + 2) + ') {\n' +
'animation-delay: ' + animationDelay * (i + 1) + 's;\n' +
'opacity: 0;\n' +
'}\n';
}
}
}
function enableSlideshow() {
logIosDebugMessage('reached enableSlideshow()');
var isPpbInViewport = adUtils && adUtils.isInViewport && adUtils.isInViewport(logoSlider);
logIosDebugMessage('isPpbInViewport: ' + isPpbInViewport.toString());
if (isPpbInViewport && !logoSlider.classList.contains('slide') && !isTempStylingPresent) {
setTimeout(function() {
logoSlider.classList.remove('hide-logo');
logoSlider.classList.add('slide');
}, 250);
}
}
function removeTempRenderingStyles(index, hasSingleLogo, image) {
if ((hasSingleLogo || index === 0) && image.style.display === 'none') {
image.style.display = '';
ppbAnchor.removeAttribute("style");
providerMessage.removeAttribute("style");
offerMessageWrapper.removeAttribute("style");
providerMessages.removeAttribute("style");
isTempStylingPresent = false;
}
enableSlideshow();
}
function resizeImage(index, isResponsive, hasSingleLogo) {
if (isIos) {
window.NativeWebBridge.getWidgetSize().then(size => {screenWidth = size.width}).catch((error) => {});
} else {
screenWidth = document.body.offsetWidth;
}
var providerLogoListElements = document.getElementsByClassName('provider-logo');
var image = providerLogoListElements.item(index);
var imgHeight = image == null ? 0 : image.naturalHeight;
var imgWidth = image == null ? 0 : image.naturalWidth;
var styledImgHeight = parseFloat(image.style.height);
var styledImgWidth = parseFloat(image.style.width);
var maxWidth = isResponsive ? (screenWidth > largeBreakpointWidth ? 200 : 125) : 125;
var maxHeight = isResponsive ? (screenWidth > largeBreakpointWidth ? 60 : 50) : 50;
var scaleFactorFromHeight = maxHeight / imgHeight;
var scaleFactorFromWidth = maxWidth / imgWidth;
var newImgWidth = scaleFactorFromHeight * imgWidth;
var newImgHeight = scaleFactorFromWidth * imgHeight;
var reachedLargerBreakpoint = (maxWidth > styledImgWidth) && (maxHeight > styledImgHeight);
var reachedSmallerBreakpoint = (maxWidth < styledImgWidth) || (maxHeight < styledImgHeight);
var imageHasStyles = image.style.height !== '' && image.style.width !== '';
var logoSliderHasStyles = logoSlider.style.width !== '';
if (!logoSliderHasStyles || !imageHasStyles || reachedLargerBreakpoint || reachedSmallerBreakpoint) {
if (newImgWidth > maxWidth) {
image.style.height = newImgHeight + 'px';
image.style.width = maxWidth + 'px';
logoSlider.style.width = maxWidth + 'px';
if (logoSlider.style.height == '' || parseFloat(logoSlider.style.height) < newImgHeight ||
parseFloat(logoSlider.style.height) > maxHeight) {
logoSlider.style.height = newImgHeight + 'px';
}
}
else {
image.style.height = maxHeight + 'px';
image.style.width = newImgWidth + 'px';
logoSlider.style.height = maxHeight + 'px';
if (logoSlider.style.width == '' || parseFloat(logoSlider.style.width) < newImgWidth ||
parseFloat(logoSlider.style.width) > maxWidth) {
logoSlider.style.width = newImgWidth + 'px';
}
}
}
removeTempRenderingStyles(index, hasSingleLogo, image);
}
            </script>
            <script type="text/javascript">
             if (typeof window.uex === 'function') {
window.uex('ld', 'provider:promotion', {wb: 1});
}
if (typeof window.csa === 'function') {
const csaLatencyPlugin = window.csa('Content', {
element: {
slotId: 'provider:promotion',
type: 'widget'
}
});
csaLatencyPlugin('mark', 'clickToLoaded', Date.now());
}
            </script>
            <!-- END PROMOTED PARTNER BAR -->

             <script id="ad_feedback_handler">
              (function(window, document) {
let slotName = 'inline50';
let linkEl = document.querySelector('#' + slotName + '_sponsored');
if (!linkEl) return;
let adFeedbackUrl = 'https://adinfo.amazon.com/?pl=%7B%22version%22%3A%221.0.0%22%2C%22client%22%3A%22IMDB%22%2C%22lop%22%3A%22en_US%22%2C%22marketplace%22%3A%22%22%2C%22region%22%3A%22NA%22%2C%22placementMetaData%22%3A%7B%22pageType%22%3A%22title%22%2C%22slotName%22%3A%22inline50%22%7D%2C%22creativeMetaData%22%3A%7B%22adProgramId%22%3A%221002%22%2C%22adElementId%22%3A%22inline50%22%2C%22creativeDetailsList%22%3A%5B%7B%22campaignId%22%3A%22584724618710252778%22%2C%22adId%22%3A%22577668004605358393%22%2C%22creativeId%22%3A%22588196420604826396%22%2C%22campaignIdNS%22%3A%22%22%2C%22selectionSignals%22%3A%7B%7D%2C%22advertiserInfo%22%3A%7B%22advertiserIdNS%22%3A%22%22%7D%7D%5D%7D%7D';
linkEl.addEventListener('click', function () {
if (window.ue && typeof window.ue.count === 'function') {
window.ue.count('SponsoredLink.Display', 1);
}
if (adFeedbackUrl) {
window.open(adFeedbackUrl, '_blank');
}
});

                   Peter Moosebridge's portrayal differs based on each region's version of the film. In the American, British, Canadian, French, and Russian versions, he remains a moose. In the Brazilian version, he's a jaguar named Onçardo Boi Chá, voiced by Brazilian journalist Ricardo Boechat who anchors Jornal da Band on Rede Bandeirantes. In the Japanese version, he's a tanuki/japanese raccoon dog. In the Australian and New Zealand versions, he's a koala named David Koalabell, voiced by Australian entertainer David Campbell. In the Chinese version, he's a panda.

               </span>

             <div class="sc-27d2f80b-0 byaXLe">
              <span class="sc-27d2f80b-1 kyzKWJ" data-testid="review-summary">
               Zootopia : The Inspiring Movie
              </span>
             </div>
             <div class="ipc-overflowText ipc-overflowText--listCard ipc-overflowText--height-long ipc-overflowText--long ipc-overflowText--click ipc-overflowText--base" data-testid="review-overflow" role="button">
              <button aria-disabled="false" aria-label="See more" class="ipc-overflowText-overlay" role="button" tabindex="0">
               <svg class="ipc-icon ipc-icon--more-horiz ipc-overflowText-overlay__affordance" fill="currentColor" height="24" role="presentation" viewbox="0 0 24 24" width="24" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg">
                <path d="M0 0h24v24H0V0z" fill="none">
                </path>
                <path d="M6 10c-1.1 0-2 .9-2 2s.9 2 2 2 2-.9 2-2-.9-2-2-2zm12 0c-1.1 0-2 .9-2 2s.9 2 2 2 2-.9 2-2-.9-2-2-2zm-6 0c-1.1 0-2 .9-2 2s.9 2 2 2 2-.9 2-2-.9-2-2-2z">
                </path>
               </svg>
              </button>
              <div class="ipc-overflowText--children">
               <div class="ipc-html-content ipc-html-content--base" role="presentation">
                <div class="ipc-html-content-inner-div">
                 Zootopia is a 3D animation movie produced by Walt Disney. Zootopia is a big city over there. Like its name, this city contains all animal characters such a zoo as well. We can find so many animal characters here and of course they bring their own characteristics. They are rabbits, foxes, goats, sheeps, wolfs, lion, sheep, rhinoceros, and any others. And the main character is a bunny or we know it as a rabbit called Judy Hopps. Ya, just a little rabbit who has wanted to be a policewoman since she was child while there was no rabbit be police. There is no matter if the citizen are just rabbits, but the problem is the citizen are not only rabbits but all of animals are over there. There are many big and strong animals such rhinoceros or lions who are more appropriate to be police than just a bunny. She had been underestimated by every one for dreaming to be police, even by her parents. But it was not a problem for her, even she must pass many difficulties, she just kept trying and trying and finally she got appreciation to be the best police since she could finish a mission of a case and found something new on it.
                 <br/>
                 <br/>
                 1. Animation
The animation moving is very smooth such as another 3D animation movie. The characters are drawn well, suit to their characteristic. We can know directly how is a character's feature even just see them, not watch them. It run a same way when some characters turn characteristic, from good to bad or vice versa, we can know it directly by their expression. It eases children to know how feature of the characters are, so they won't be confused by watching this movie especially when some characters change their appanage. This movie has a beautiful color, contras but still in harmony and it makes gazer, from children to adult, be able to enjoy this movie well.
2. Score
For me, every single sound in this movie is nice, very nice. From the dubbing, sound effect, and of course the sound track. The sound track, Try Everything by Shakira, is very representative that movie and it suits when it played while Judy Hopps was enjoying her journey from her hometown to Zootopia. So, we, as gazer, can enjoy both of picture and the song.
3. Plot twist
This is the most unexpected part of this movie when Mrs. Bellwether changed into a bad character. In the beginning, she was very good and helpful to Judy, but it turned out that she was a mastermind of all of "disaster" in the movie. This part gives us some breaks when we have a bit been bored think who is the mastermind of the problem.
4. Moral Value
Same as its soundtrack, this movie reminds us not to give up on everything, just keep trying and trying, trying everything and making something new. Life is all about problems, problems always come and leave. One problem has been solved and another problem will come to us, of course, that's a life. And for facing our problem, just ignore people say for braking our dream, just keep trying and prove that we can do for reaching our dream. And don't be afraid to fall on our journey, believe in ourselves that we can, we can, and we can.
This movie was very impressive to me when I watched in 2016, I was in senior high school. I had a dream that it was very difficult for me at that time. It made me doubt that I could reach my dream. By watching this movie, I cried and created an advice for my own, "Believe in yourself that you can reach what you want as long as you want to try more, more and more, nothing impossible in this world." Moreover, the plot twist reminds us for not to ease believing someone and not to judge a book by its cover.
                 <br/>
                 <br/>
                 For me, this movie has almost no lack. This film is very recommended for watching by everyone, from children to adult, even elderly, because of its own picture and its value. For children who haven't been able to understand the value, they can enjoy the beautiful picture, the cute characters and moments, and of course the song. And for another, they can remind themselves by value of this movi
                </div>
               </div>
              </div>
             </div>
             <div class="ipc-list-card__actions">

: The Inspiring Movie","__typename":"ReviewSummary"},"text":{"originalText":{"plainText":"Zootopia is a 3D animation movie produced by Walt Disney. Zootopia is a big city over there. Like its name, this city contains all animal characters such a zoo as well. We can find so many animal characters here and of course they bring their own characteristics. They are rabbits, foxes, goats, sheeps, wolfs, lion, sheep, rhinoceros, and any others. And the main character is a bunny or we know it as a rabbit called Judy Hopps. Ya, just a little rabbit who has wanted to be a policewoman since she was child while there was no rabbit be police. There is no matter if the citizen are just rabbits, but the problem is the citizen are not only rabbits but all of animals are over there. There are many big and strong animals such rhinoceros or lions who are more appropriate to be police than just a bunny. She had been underestimated by every one for dreaming to be police, even by her parents. But it was not a problem for her, even she must pass many difficulties, she just kept trying and trying and finally she got appreciation to be the best police since she could finish a mission of a case and found something new on it.\n\n1. Animation The animation moving is very smooth such as another 3D animation movie. The characters are drawn well, suit to their characteristic. We can know directly how is a character's feature even just see them, not watch them. It run a same way when some characters turn characteristic, from good to bad or vice versa, we can know it directly by their expression. It eases children to know how feature of the characters are, so they won't be confused by watching this movie especially when some characters change their appanage. This movie has a beautiful color, contras but still in harmony and it makes gazer, from children to adult, be able to enjoy this movie well. 2. Score For me, every single sound in this movie is nice, very nice. From the dubbing, sound effect, and of course the sound track. The sound track, Try Everything by Shakira, is very representative that movie and it suits when it played while Judy Hopps was enjoying her journey from her hometown to Zootopia. So, we, as gazer, can enjoy both of picture and the song. 3. Plot twist This is the most unexpected part of this movie when Mrs. Bellwether changed into a bad character. In the beginning, she was very good and helpful to Judy, but it turned out that she was a mastermind of all of \"disaster\" in the movie. This part gives us some breaks when we have a bit been bored think who is the mastermind of the problem. 4. Moral Value Same as its soundtrack, this movie reminds us not to give up on everything, just keep trying and trying, trying everything and making something new. Life is all about problems, problems always come and leave. One problem has been solved and another problem will come to us, of course, that's a life. And for facing our problem, just ignore people say for braking our dream, just keep trying and prove that we can do for reaching our dream. And don't be afraid to fall on our journey, believe in ourselves that we can, we can, and we can. This movie was very impressive to me when I watched in 2016, I was in senior high school. I had a dream that it was very difficult for me at that time. It made me doubt that I could reach my dream. By watching this movie, I cried and created an advice for my own, \"Believe in yourself that you can reach what you want as long as you want to try more, more and more, nothing impossible in this world.\" Moreover, the plot twist reminds us for not to ease believing someone and not to judge a book by its cover.\n\nFor me, this movie has almost no lack. This film is very recommended for watching by everyone, from children to adult, even elderly, because of its own picture and its value. For children who haven't been able to understand the value, they can enjoy the beautiful picture, the cute characters and moments, and of course the song. And for another, they can remind themselves by value of this Zootopia is a big city over there. Like its name, this city contains all animal characters such a zoo as well. We can find so many animal characters here and of course they bring their own characteristics. They are rabbits, foxes, goats, sheeps, wolfs, lion, sheep, rhinoceros, and any others. And the main character is a bunny or we know it as a rabbit called Judy Hopps. Ya, just a little rabbit who has wanted to be a policewoman since she was child while there was no rabbit be police. There is no matter if the citizen are just rabbits, but the problem is the citizen are not only rabbits but all of animals are over there. There are many big and strong animals such rhinoceros or lions who are more appropriate to be police than just a bunny. She had been underestimated by every one for dreaming to be police, even by her parents. But it was not a problem for her, even she must pass many difficulties, she just kept trying and trying and finally she got appreciation to be the best police since she could finish a mission of a case and found something new on it.\u003cbr/\u003e\u003cbr/\u003e1. Animation\nThe animation moving is very smooth such as another 3D animation movie. The characters are drawn well, suit to their characteristic. We can know directly how is a character\u0026#39;s feature even just see them, not watch them. It run a same way when some characters turn characteristic, from good to bad or vice versa, we can know it directly by their expression. It eases children to know how feature of the characters are, so they won\u0026#39;t be confused by watching this movie especially when some characters change their appanage. This movie has a beautiful color, contras but still in harmony and it makes gazer, from children to adult, be able to enjoy this movie well.\n2. Score\nFor me, every single sound in this movie is nice, very nice. From the dubbing, sound effect, and of course the sound track. The sound track, Try Everything by Shakira, is very representative that movie and it suits when it played while Judy Hopps was enjoying her journey from her hometown to Zootopia. So, we, as gazer, can enjoy both of picture and the song.\n3. Plot twist\nThis is the most unexpected part of this movie when Mrs. Bellwether changed into a bad character. In the beginning, she was very good and helpful to Judy, but it turned out that she was a mastermind of all of \u0026quot;disaster\u0026quot; in the movie. This part gives us some breaks when we have a bit been bored think who is the mastermind of the problem.\n4. Moral Value\nSame as its soundtrack, this movie reminds us not to give up on everything, just keep trying and trying, trying everything and making something new. Life is all about problems, problems always come and leave. One problem has been solved and another problem will come to us, of course, that\u0026#39;s a life. And for facing our problem, just ignore people say for braking our dream, just keep trying and prove that we can do for reaching our dream. And don\u0026#39;t be afraid to fall on our journey, believe in ourselves that we can, we can, and we can.\nThis movie was very impressive to me when I watched in 2016, I was in senior high school. I had a dream that it was very difficult for me at that time. It made me doubt that I could reach my dream. By watching this movie, I cried and created an advice for my own, \u0026quot;Believe in yourself that you can reach what you want as long as you want to try more, more and more, nothing impossible in this world.\u0026quot; Moreover, the plot twist reminds us for not to ease believing someone and not to judge a book by its cover.\u003cbr/\u003e\u003cbr/\u003eFor me, this movie has almost no lack. This film is very recommended for watching by everyone, from children to adult, even elderly, because of its own picture and its value. For children who haven\u0026#39;t been able to understand the value, they can enjoy the beautiful picture, the cute characters and moments, and of course the song. And for another, they can remind themselves by value of this
